name: Ammos Tower
description:
Story:

    Some years ago you took a job at company providing tower cleaning services.
Today you have to go to a shady tower in the middle of the desert.
Equipped with your trusty Vacuumusket, you go in.
Once inside, you notice a big plug on the floor of the tower, and figure youmight as well unplug it and clean the pipes.
So you unplug the plug.And the tower starts to sink in the sand.
Now your immediate task is to GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE!

Concept:

    Ammos Tower is an endless platformer where you have a Vacuumusket (a mix between a vacuum and a gun) to collect ammo from the sand threatening to suffocate you, and use it to propel yourself in the air and defend yourself against enemies. All whilst climbing a randomly generated tower!

Input:
  • Move: Arrow Keys,WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Shoot: X, K
  • Vacuum (if Auto-Vacuum is disabled): C, L
Credits: Programming: Geek_Joystick
Art: Tung T. Tran, Alex Frasca
Music: Nils K
SFX: Dori Holly
Game Design: Geek_Joystick, TungTT, LANA Testers:
